pr_title: Cgmes update simple update chlog index

timeline.message:
Add test for changes log right order

Signed-off-by: Elena Kaltakova <kaltakovae@aia.es>

simplify verification that a list of changes is sorted

Signed-off-by: Luma Zamarreño <zamarrenolm@aia.es>

timeline.bodyText: If the order is important, maybe we should use a TreeSet, with a comparator on the index?
timeline.author: mathbagu
mathbagu

timeline.bodyText:
Use a stream: it's more modern:
return changes.stream().filter(IidmChangeRemoval.class::isInstance).collect(Collectors.toList());
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: Do you wan simply to check if the list is empty?
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText: To test the right ordering, the list of changes should have multiple items.
replies.author: kaltakovae

timeline.bodyText: this method (and other utilitaries test methods) can be static
timeline.author: MioRtia

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'master' into cgmes_update_simple_update_chlog_index

Signed-off-by: Elena Kaltakova <kaltakovae@aia.es>

Pull request fixes: use TreeSet with a comparator on the index; use stream; set utilitaries methods as static where possible
